text:
="preserve">Paul Seban (21 October 1929 – 1 July 2020) was an Algerian-born French movie director and journalist. He was born in Sidi Bel Abbès, French Algeria. He wrote articles for "Positif" and "Ligue de l'enseignement". He was known for directing "La Musica" and "French Cancan".
Seban died on 1 July 2020 in Paris, aged 90.
